DOC.brief_title: Safety Extension Study Of Tanezumab When Administered By Subcutaneous Injection To Patients With Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This study terminate 29 September 2010 follow US FDA clinical hold tanezumab osteoarthritis clinical study halt dose enrollment patient 23 June 2010 potential safety issue .
